get.description: Endpoint used to retrieve the list of the card linked to the logged user with the online dynamic pin enabled.

post.description: Endpoint used to get the online temporary pin

card_pan.description: Pan of the card requesting the pin

totp_seed.description: Seed to be used for the paired pan

post.description: Endpoint used to retrieve the list of the card linked to the logged user with the offline dynamic pin enabled.

parameters.name: article_id
parameters.description: The article id used to filter vehicles of this customer

get.description: get list of articles from supplier_id
get all fuelstations from the managerId

post.description: add or modify fuelstation from selected managerId

get.description: get all articles from the fuelstationId

post.description: add or modify article from selected managerFuelstationId

get.description: get list of tanks of supplier_id selected

article_id.description: Article id referred by this price

start_datetime.description: The price is applied after this datetime

article_name.description: Name of the article referred by this price

sourceApp.description: optional source app of the request

email.description: email address of to user enable

sourceApp.description: optional source app of the request

email.description: email address of to user to promote

unlock_fuelstation_code.description: Fuelstation code where unlock event happened

unlock_fuelstation_name.description: Fuelstation name where unlock event happened

lock_fuelstation_code.description: Fuelstation code where lock event happened

lock_fuelstation_name.description: Fuelstation name where lock event happened

username.description: Username that requested unlock on fuelcoupon

causal.description: Causal of the invoice. Cannot be empty..

is_enabled.description: True if vehicle is active, false otherwise.

enabled_articles.description: Enabled articles ids, lookup for article details using /articles/{id} endpoint

user_role.description: For Invoice&GO customer users, its value is 0 for master users and 1 for sub users.

is_customer_iego.description: True if the linked customer is an Invoice&GO customer, false otherwise

customer_id.description: Optional customer id linked to this user

vehicle_id.description: Used to assign one specific vehicle to this user. When this is set, the user can use only this vehicle in Invoice&GO

supplier_id.description: Optional supplier id linked to the customer

is_enabled.description: True if user is active, false otherwise

identity_provider_id.description: Id assigned from the identity provider

enabled_services.description:
Active services for the user:
"iego" stands for Invoice&GO
"dynamic_pin" stands for offline dynamic pin
"online_pin" stands for online dynamic pin

notify_recharge.description: True if the system sends an email to the customer to notify a recharge operation, false otherwise

has_driver_request.description: True if the customer has to type the driver code when performing a transaction, false otherwise

ignore_payment_mode_on_pos.description: If true ignores customer payment mode for POS recharges

oil_iban.description: If not empty, oil invoices uses this iban if needed

has_driver_check.description: True if the system check the driver code (it has to be an authorizative PIN), false otherwise

app_can_see_balance.description: True if in the Selfnet mobile app user can see the customer credit, false otherwise

merge_invoices.description: If True, OIL and NON OIL invoices are merged (where possible), false otherwise

is_without_vat.description: If True, the customer has no VAT number

card_type_id.description:
Only for Selfnet GT cards customers, shows the owner circuit.
Possible valuesa are:
  • 9 DKV
  • 10 UTA
  • 13 EWG
  • 39 FAI
  • 42 EDC (RADIUS)

registration_date.description: Customer's registration date in the system

parent_id.description: Parent client ID reverse change management

is_external_customer.description: True if the customer is created by API called by third parties. Only used in GET endpoints

is_exported.description: True if the customer is created and still never exported, false otherwise

residue_type.description: Shows on the receipt card or customer residue

stamp_duty.description: If true invoices have stamp duty when numbers permits it

sdi_code.description: SDI code used to receive electronic invoices

supplier_id.description: Supplier owner of customer data (not set for I&GO customers)

non_oil_iban.description: If not empty, non oil invoices uses this iban if needed

notify_2.description:
True if the system sends an email to secondary customer email address, false otherwise.
If the field notify (or the field notify_recharge) is set to False, this value is ignored.

notify_3.description:
True if the system sends an email to third customer email address, false otherwise.
If the field notify (or the field notify_recharge) is set to False, this value is ignored.

has_customer_recharge.description: True if the recharge operations increase the customer credit,False if they increase the credit of the single involved card.

notify_1.description:
True if the system sends an email to main customer email address, false otherwise.
If the field notify (or the field notify_recharge) is set to False, this value is ignored.

notify.description: True if the system sends an email to the customer to notify his operations, false otherwise

article_id.description: Article id to add costs to the customer invoice

is_enabled.description: True if customer is active, false otherwise

has_account_balance.description: True if the system generates the account balance for this customer, false otherwise

enabled_vehicles.description: Enabled vehicles ids, lookup for vehicle details using /vehicles/{id} endpoint

electronic_invoice.description: True if the customer use the ICAD Sistemi electronic invoice

start_invoice_date.description: For Selfnet customer, represents the electronic invoice starting dateIf NULL, invoices start when the field electronic_invoice is activated

payment_terms_id.description:
Payment terms identifier. It is used only for Selfnet customers
Possible values are:
  • 2 5 gg data fattura
  • 3 15 gg data fattura
  • 4 30 gg fine mese data fattura
  • 5 60 gg fine mese data fattura
  • 6 90 gg fine mese data fattura
  • 22 Data Fattura
  • 23 25 gg data fattura
  • 26 30 gg data fattura
  • 27 45 gg data fattura
  • 28 35 gg data fattura
  • 29 40 gg data fattura
  • 30 60 gg fine mese + 12gg
  • 31 30 gg fine mese + 12gg
  • 32 20 gg data fattura
  • 33 30 gg fine mese + 8gg
  • 34 60 gg fine mese + 10gg
  • 35 30 gg fine mese + 5gg
  • 36 30 gg fine mese + 10gg
  • 37 60 gg fine mese + 15gg
  • 38 10 gg data fattura
  • 39 30 gg fine mese + 15gg
  • 40 60 gg fine mese + 5gg
  • 41 60 gg data fattura
  • 42 90 gg fine mese + 10gg
  • 43 90 gg data fattura

payment_mode_id.description:
Payment mode identifier.
Possible values are:
  • MP01: Contanti
  • MP02: Assegno
  • MP03: assegno circolare
  • MP04: contanti presso Tesoreria
  • MP05: Bonifico
  • MP06: vaglia cambiario
  • MP07: bollettino bancario
  • MP08: Carta di pagamento
  • MP09: RID
  • MP10: RID utenze
  • MP11: RID veloce
  • MP12: Ricevuta bancaria
  • MP13: MAV
  • MP14: quietanza erario stato
  • MP15: giroconto su conti di contabilit speciale
  • MP16: domiciliazione bancaria
  • MP17: domiciliazione postale
  • MP18: Bollettino di c/c postale
  • MP19: SEPA Direct Debit
  • MP20: SEPA Direct Debit CORE
  • MP21: SEPA Direct Debit B2B
  • MP22: Trattenuta su somme gi riscosse
  • MP23: PagoPA

has_km_request.description: True if the customer has to type the km value when performing a transaction, false otherwise

has_invoice.description: True if the customer needs to invoice his transactions, false otherwise

has_km_check.description: True if the system check the value of the field has_km_request, false otherwise

price_list_id.description: Price list identifier linked to this customer

payment_periodicity_id.description:
Payment periodicity identifier.
Possible values are:
  • N Immediata (both for Invoice&GO and Selfnet customers)
  • W Settimanale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • D Decade (only for Selfnet customers)
  • F Quindicinale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • M Mensile (both for Invoice&GO and Selfnet customers)
  • B Bimestrale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • Q Trimestrale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • X Nessuna (only for Selfnet customers)

enabled_articles.description: Enabled articles ids, lookup for article details using /articles/{id} endpoint

has_split_payment.description: True if the customer use the split payment, false otherwise

is_immediate.description: True if the invoice is issued with immediate periodicity, false otherwise

status_code.description:
Current status id of the invoice
Possible values are:
  • SF01 Inserita dal cliente (SF01)
  • SF02 Validata dal gestore (SF02)
  • SF03 Inviata (SF03)
  • SF04 Errore (SF04)
  • SF05 Consegnata (SF05)
  • SF07 Scartata (SF07)
  • SF08 Accettata dal destinatario (SF08)
  • SF09 Rifiutata dal destinatario (SF09)
  • SF010 Accettata automaticamente (SF10)
  • SF011 Non consegnata (definitivo) (SF11)
  • SF012 Rifiutata manualmente (SF12)

fuel_station_id.description: Optional reference to the fuel station where the invoice is created. If this is NULL, supplier_id must be set.

sending_counter_hex.description: Unique invoice counter, used in the invoice file name

year.description: Year when the invoice is issued

sending_datetime.description: Date time when the invoice is scheduled for issuing

fuel_station_city.description: City of the involved fuel station (if present)

is_oil.description: True if the invoice contains only oil transactions, false if it contains only non oil transactions. NULL if it contains both of them.

fuel_station_full_address.description: Concat of fuel_station_flag, fuel_station_name, fuel_station_address and fuel_station_city

discount_increase.description: 0 if there is no discount on the transaction's total amount.

amount.description: Amount payed with this payment method

payment_method_code.description:
Payment method code
Possible values are:
  • MP01: Contanti
  • MP02: Assegno
  • MP03: assegno circolare
  • MP04: contanti presso Tesoreria
  • MP05: Bonifico
  • MP06: vaglia cambiario
  • MP07: bollettino bancario
  • MP08: Carta di pagamento
  • MP09: RID
  • MP10: RID utenze
  • MP11: RID veloce
  • MP12: Ricevuta bancaria
  • MP13: MAV
  • MP14: quietanza erario stato
  • MP15: giroconto su conti di contabilit speciale
  • MP16: domiciliazione bancaria
  • MP17: domiciliazione postale
  • MP18: Bollettino di c/c postale
  • MP19: SEPA Direct Debit
  • MP20: SEPA Direct Debit CORE
  • MP21: SEPA Direct Debit B2B
  • MP22: Trattenuta su somme gi riscosse
  • MP23: PagoPA

ddt_number.description: DDT number associated to the transaction

unit_price.description: Unit price of the purchased article

detail_status_code.description: Current status of this record. It can be SF01 (to be approved), SF02 (approved) or SF12 (manually rejected)

card_id.description: Optional card involved in this transaction

is_oil.description: True if the transaction refers to OIL article, false otherwise

insert_invoice_mode_id.description:
Identifies transaction's origin. Possibile values:
  • 1: manual insert by manager
  • 2: manual insert by the customer
  • 3: from station PC
  • 4: from Self, by customer with ticket number
  • : Selfnet transaction

total_amount.description: Total gros amount of this transaction

credit_note_detail_id.description: Optional credit note detail id (used when this transaction is reversed)

decrement_total.description: If true, decrements transaction amount from the total. False otherwise.

is_customer_split.description: True if the customer is under split payment, false otherwise

payment_date.description: The date when the invoice is payed by the customer (if payment scheduler is active)

sending_error.description: True if during the first sending attempt, an error occured

issuing_datetime.description: Date time when the invoice is issued

is_from_selfnet.description: True if the invoice refers to Selfnet (invoice generated by cards), false otherwise (Invoice&GO invoices)

customer_payment_method.description: Only for Selfnet invoices (not I&GO). It contains the name of the payment method used by the involved customer

discount_increase.description: 0 if there is no discount/increse on the invoice amount. The value is positive for an increase, negative for a discount.

cost_center_id.description: Cost center optionally linked to the invoice

is_downloaded.description: True if the invoice was downloaded with the massive donwload, false otherwise

is_electronically_stored.description: True if the invoice is electronically stored, false otherwise

has_withholding.description: True if the invoice has withholding, false otherwise

protocol_id.description: Optional procotol id assigned to this invoice

payment_date_expire.description: The date when the invoice payment expires (if payment scheduler is active)

fuel_station_flag.description: Flag of the involved fuel station (if present)

fuel_station_name.description: Name of the involved fuel station (if present)

document_type_id.description:
Invoice type id.
Possible values are:
  • TD01: Fattura immediata
  • TD04: Nota di Credito
  • TD17: Integrazione/autofattura per acquisto servizi dallestero
  • TD18: Integrazione per acquisto di beni intracomunitari
  • TD19: Integrazione/autofattura per acquisto di beni ex art.17 c.2 DPR 633/72
  • TD24: Fattura differita di cui allart.21, comma 4, lett. a)
  • TD27: Fattura per autoconsumo o per cessioni gratuite senza rivalsa

payment_notes.description: Optional notes linked to the payment (if payment scheduler is active)

father_id.description: Reference to the optional invoice who generated this (used in case of credit note)

customer_id.description: Customer who is the recipient of the invoice

fuel_station_address.description: Address of the involved fuel station (if present)

supplier_id.description: Id of the supplier who owns the invoice. In an active invoice, if this is NULL, fuel_station_id must be set.

article_id.description: Article id referred by this price

start_datetime.description: The price is applied after this datetime

unattended_manual_insert.description: True if after failing an attempt to retrieve data from the computer station, the user can proceed manually for an unattended transaction

disable_self_discount.description: True if the self service customer discount is disabled, false otherwise

code.description: Code assigned to the fuel station by the supplier

attended_is_receipt_number_mandatory.description: True if the receipt number is mandatory for attended transactions

attended_is_photo_mandatory.description: True if the receipt photo is mandatory for attended transactions

unattended_is_receipt_number_mandatory.description: True if the receipt number is mandatory for unattended transactions

unattended_auto_retrieve_invoice_data.description: True if this fuel station can retrieve data from the computer station for unattended transactions

unattended_is_photo_mandatory.description:
This fields determines if the photo for unattened photos is mandatory.
The possible values are:
  • 0: the photo is never mandatory
  • 1: the photo is mandatory only for manual inserts
  • 2: the photo is always mandatory

unattended_default_status_id.description: Link to the default invoice status ('1' stands for 'approved' and '2' for 'to be approved') for unattended transactions

attended_manual_insert.description: True if after failing an attempt to retrieve data from the computer station, the customer can proceed manually for an attended transaction

manager_id.description: Id of the fuel station manager

store_id.description: Store id of the fuel station

attended_auto_retrieve_invoice_data.description: True if this fuel station can retrieve data from the computer station for attended transactions

is_master.description: True if this fuel station (in multisupplier configuration) is the master, false otherwise

invoice_header_id.description: Link with the invoice header data to be used

has_non_oil.description: True if this fuel station has the non oil Selfnet invoicing, false otherwise

has_invoice.description: True if this fuel station issues invoices without supplier header data, false otherwise (the header is read from the supplier)

has_pos_recharge.description: True if the pos can perform recharging operations, false otherwise

protocol_id.description: Link to the protocol to be used in the invoices

is_enabled.description: True if the fuel station is active, false otherwise

dispensers_count.description: Total count of the dispenser active in the fuel station

has_non_oil_invoice_and_go.description: True if this fuel station has the non oil Invoice&GO invoicing, false otherwise

has_igo_invoice.description: True if this fuel station has Invoice&GO invoicing, false otherwise

has_manual_ddt.description: True if the fuel station has manual ddt, false otherwise

duplicate_master.description: True if in multisupplier, the system duplicates the transactions from the master to the slave, false otherwise

enabled_articles.description: Enabled articles ids, lookup for article details using /articles/{id} endpoint

attended_default_status_id.description: Link to the default invoice status ('1' stands for 'approved' and '2' for 'to be approved') for attended transactions

supplier_id.description: Store id of the fuel station

requires_fuel_station.description: True if during invoice detail creation, the fuel station is mandatory. False otherwise

is_enabled.description: True if category is active, false otherwise

requires_vehicle.description: True if during invoice detail creation, the vehicle is mandatory. False otherwise

has_withholdilg.description: True if the articles in this category have withholding. False otherwise

protocol_id.description: Optional invoice protocol linked to the category

supplier_id.description: Supplier owner of the category

is_oil.description: True if the category contains oil articles. False otherwise

is_customer_cost.description:
True if this category is designed for the customer cost articles. False otherwise.
Customer cost articles are used to add optional costs in the Selfnet invoices of one or more customers.

is_from_selfnet.description: True if the invoice refers to Selfnet (invoice generated by cards), false otherwise (Invoice&GO invoices)

Current status id of the invoice
Possible values are:
  • SF01 Inserita dal cliente (SF01)
  • SF02 Validata dal gestore (SF02)
  • SF03 Inviata (SF03)
  • SF04 Errore (SF04)

price_list_id.description: Price list identifier linked to this customer

payment_periodicity_id.description:
Payment periodicity identifier.
Possible values are:
  • N Immediata (both for Invoice&GO and Selfnet customers)
  • W Settimanale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • D Decade (only for Selfnet customers)
  • F Quindicinale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • M Mensile (both for Invoice&GO and Selfnet customers)
  • B Bimestrale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • Q Trimestrale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • X Nessuna (only for Selfnet customers)

has_split_payment.description: True if the customer use the split payment, false otherwise

rea_single_partner.description: True if the society has an unique partner, false otherwise

bic.description: It is a data provided for by the legislation (art.2250 of the civil code) regarding the advertising obligations of companies

recharge_invoice.description: If true, the system issues invoices for recharging operations. False otherwise.

generate_autoinvoice_td27.description: If true, the system use document type 'TD27' for auto invoices. False otherwise.

auto_emission_account_balance.description: If true, account balances are automatically created. False otherwise.

short_name.description: Supplier portal name. This is the name showed in portal and apps.

fuel_coupon_invoice.description: If true, the system issues invoices for fuel coupons creations. False otherwise.

pumpNumber.description: True if the fuel station is active, false otherwise

refuelMode.description: True if in multisupplier, the system duplicates the transactions from the master to the slave, false otherwise

pumpStatus.description: True if this fuel station (in multisupplier configuration) is the master, false otherwise

residue_type.description: The type_id identify the tipologies of the cards: TypeId = 1: This cards is a monthly cards, TypeId = 2: This cards is a rechargeable cards

daily_residue.description: Daily residue of the cards. If the daily residue is 9999. This is a infinite daily plafond

quantity.description: Quantity purchased of the involved article

notes.description: Optional notes. Used in manual supplies.

transactions.description: Array of transactions created linked to the supplies

storage_status_id.description:
Shows the current status in the electronic storage flow (if available).
Possible values are:
  • 1 Da compilare
  • 2 Compilata
  • 3 Pronta per l'invio
  • 4 Inviata
  • 5 Conservata (only this is used for active invoices, the other values are for passive invoices)
  • 6 Errore

Invoice type id.

  • TD01: Fattura immediata
  • TD04: Nota di Credito
  • TD17: Integrazione/autofattura per acquisto servizi dallestero
  • TD18: Integrazione per acquisto di beni intracomunitari
  • TD19: Integrazione/autofattura per acquisto di beni ex art.17 c.2 DPR 633/72
  • TD24: Fattura differita di cui allart.21, comma 4, lett. a)
  • TD27: Fattura per autoconsumo o per cessioni gratuite senza rivalsa

This fields determines if the photo for unattened photos is mandatory.
The possible values are:
  • 0: the photo is never mandatory
  • 1: the photo is mandatory only for manual inserts
  • 2: the photo is always mandatory

issuing_datetime.description: Date time when the invoice is issued

is_immediate.description: True if the invoice is issued with immediate periodicity, false otherwise

is_from_selfnet.description: True if the invoice refers to Selfnet (invoice generated by cards), false otherwise (Invoice&GO invoices)

year.description: Year when the invoice is issued

customer_vat.description: Customer VAT who is the recipient of the invoice

fuel_station_name.description: Name of the involved fuel station (if present)

is_oil.description: True if the invoice contains only oil transactions, false if it contains only non oil transactions. NULL if it contains both of them.

document_type_id.description:
Invoice type id.
Possible values are:
  • TD01: Fattura immediata
  • TD04: Nota di Credito
  • TD17: Integrazione/autofattura per acquisto servizi dallestero
  • TD18: Integrazione per acquisto di beni intracomunitari
  • TD19: Integrazione/autofattura per acquisto di beni ex art.17 c.2 DPR 633/72
  • TD24: Fattura differita di cui allart.21, comma 4, lett. a)
  • TD27: Fattura per autoconsumo o per cessioni gratuite senza rivalsa

customer_id.description: Customer who is the recipient of the invoice

supplier_id.description: Id of the supplier who owns the invoice. In an active invoice, if this is NULL, fuel_station_id must be set.

base64String.description: A base64 string representing a file

supplier_id.description: Supplier owner of the protocol

requires_fuel_station.description: True if during invoice detail creation, the fuel station is mandatory. False otherwise

is_enabled.description: True if category is active, false otherwise

requires_vehicle.description: True if during invoice detail creation, the vehicle is mandatory. False otherwise

has_withholdilg.description: True if the articles in this category have withholding. False otherwise

protocol_id.description: Optional invoice protocol linked to the category

supplier_id.description: Supplier owner of the category

is_oil.description: True if the category contains oil articles. False otherwise

is_customer_cost.description:
True if this category is designed for the customer cost articles. False otherwise.
Customer cost articles are used to add optional costs in the Selfnet invoices of one or more customers.

notify_recharge.description: True if the system sends an email to the customer to notify a recharge operation, false otherwise

has_driver_request.description: True if the customer has to type the driver code when performing a transaction, false otherwise

ignore_payment_mode_on_pos.description: If true ignores customer payment mode for POS recharges

oil_iban.description: If not empty, oil invoices uses this iban if needed

has_driver_check.description: True if the system check the driver code (it has to be an authorizative PIN), false otherwise

app_can_see_balance.description: True if in the Selfnet mobile app user can see the customer credit, false otherwise

merge_invoices.description: If True, OIL and NON OIL invoices are merged (where possible), false otherwise

is_without_vat.description: If True, the customer has no VAT number

card_type_id.description:
Only for Selfnet GT cards customers, shows the owner circuit.
Possible valuesa are:
  • 9 DKV
  • 10 UTA
  • 13 EWG
  • 39 FAI
  • 42 EDC (RADIUS)

registration_date.description: Customer's registration date in the system

parent_id.description: Parent client ID reverse change management

is_external_customer.description: True if the customer is created by API called by third parties. Only used in GET endpoints

is_exported.description: True if the customer is created and still never exported, false otherwise

residue_type.description: Shows on the receipt card or customer residue

stamp_duty.description: If true invoices have stamp duty when numbers permits it

sdi_code.description: SDI code used to receive electronic invoices

supplier_id.description: Supplier owner of customer data (not set for I&GO customers)

non_oil_iban.description: If not empty, non oil invoices uses this iban if needed

notify_2.description:
True if the system sends an email to secondary customer email address, false otherwise.
If the field notify (or the field notify_recharge) is set to False, this value is ignored.

notify_3.description:
True if the system sends an email to third customer email address, false otherwise.
If the field notify (or the field notify_recharge) is set to False, this value is ignored.

has_customer_recharge.description: True if the recharge operations increase the customer credit,False if they increase the credit of the single involved card.

notify_1.description:
True if the system sends an email to main customer email address, false otherwise.
If the field notify (or the field notify_recharge) is set to False, this value is ignored.

notify.description: True if the system sends an email to the customer to notify his operations, false otherwise

article_id.description: Article id to add costs to the customer invoice

is_enabled.description: True if customer is active, false otherwise

has_account_balance.description: True if the system generates the account balance for this customer, false otherwise

enabled_vehicles.description: Enabled vehicles ids, lookup for vehicle details using /vehicles/{id} endpoint

electronic_invoice.description: True if the customer use the ICAD Sistemi electronic invoice

start_invoice_date.description: For Selfnet customer, represents the electronic invoice starting dateIf NULL, invoices start when the field electronic_invoice is activated

payment_terms_id.description:
Payment terms identifier. It is used only for Selfnet customers
Possible values are:
  • 2 5 gg data fattura
  • 3 15 gg data fattura
  • 4 30 gg fine mese data fattura
  • 5 60 gg fine mese data fattura

payment_mode_id.description:
Payment mode identifier.
Possible values are:
  • MP01: Contanti
  • MP02: Assegno
  • MP03: assegno circolare
  • MP04: contanti presso Tesoreria
  • MP05: Bonifico
  • MP06: vaglia cambiario
  • MP07: bollettino bancario
  • MP08: Carta di pagamento
  • MP09: RID
  • MP10: RID utenze
  • MP11: RID veloce
  • MP12: Ricevuta bancaria
  • MP13: MAV
  • MP14: quietanza erario stato
  • MP15: giroconto su conti di contabilit speciale
  • MP16: domiciliazione bancaria
  • MP17: domiciliazione postale
  • MP18: Bollettino di c/c postale
  • MP19: SEPA Direct Debit
  • MP20: SEPA Direct Debit CORE
  • MP21: SEPA Direct Debit B2B
  • MP22: Trattenuta su somme gi riscosse
  • MP23: PagoPA

has_km_request.description: True if the customer has to type the km value when performing a transaction, false otherwise

has_invoice.description: True if the customer needs to invoice his transactions, false otherwise

has_km_check.description: True if the system check the value of the field has_km_request, false otherwise

price_list_id.description: Price list identifier linked to this customer

payment_periodicity_id.description:
Payment periodicity identifier.
Possible values are:
  • N Immediata (both for Invoice&GO and Selfnet customers)
  • W Settimanale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • D Decade (only for Selfnet customers)
  • F Quindicinale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • M Mensile (both for Invoice&GO and Selfnet customers)
  • B Bimestrale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • Q Trimestrale (only for Selfnet customers)
  • X Nessuna (only for Selfnet customers)

enabled_articles.description: Enabled articles ids, lookup for article details using /articles/{id} endpoint

has_split_payment.description: True if the customer use the split payment, false otherwise

can_outdoor.description: True if the card can perform transactions outdoor, false otherwise

type_id.description:
Card type id.
Possible values are:
  • 2 (prepaid card)
  • 3 (discount card)
  • 4 (fidelity/points card)
  • 5 (end of month card)

cost_center_id.description: Optional cost center id, whose the card is linked

has_km_request.description: True if the customer has to digit the odometer value during a transaction, false otherwise

has_km_check.description: True if the the system check the has_km_request value, false otherwise

delivery_datetime.description: When the card is given to the customer

is_enabled.description: True if the card is enabled, false otherwise

daily_max_limit.description: Daily usage limit of the card

can_indoor.description: True if the card can perform transactions indoor, false otherwise

enabled_articles.description: Enabled articles ids, lookup for article details using /articles/{id} endpoint

has_excise_duty.description: True if the invoices binded to this card must report the excise duty amount, false otherwise

customer_id.description: Id of the customer owner of the card

supplier_id.description: Id of the supplier owner of the card

supplier_code.description: Code of the supplier owner of the card (import export purpose)

customer_code.description: Code of the customer owner of the card (import export purpose)

email.description: Optional email linked to the card, used to send email after a transaction

source_card_pan.description: Pan of the source card in a transfer

target_card_code.description: Code of the target card in a transfer

source_card_code.description: Code of the source card in a transfer

target_card_pan.description: Pan of the target card in a transfer

user.description: Username of the user who made the operation

market.description: If True, the family is managed by the pos. False otherwise.

requires_fuel_station.description: True if during invoice detail creation, the fuel station is mandatory. False otherwise

is_enabled.description: True if category is active, false otherwise

requires_vehicle.description: True if during invoice detail creation, the vehicle is mandatory. False otherwise

has_withholdilg.description: True if the articles in this category have withholding. False otherwise

protocol_id.description: Optional invoice protocol linked to the category

supplier_id.description: Supplier owner of the category

is_oil.description: True if the category contains oil articles. False otherwise

is_customer_cost.description:
True if this category is designed for the customer cost articles. False otherwise.
Customer cost articles are used to add optional costs in the Selfnet invoices of one or more customers.

amount.description: Amount payed with this payment method

payment_method_code.description:
Payment method code
Possible values are:
  • MP01: Contanti
  • MP02: Assegno
  • MP03: assegno circolare
  • MP04: contanti presso Tesoreria
  • MP05: Bonifico
  • MP06: vaglia cambiario
  • MP07: bollettino bancario
  • MP08: Carta di pagamento
  • MP09: RID
  • MP10: RID utenze
  • MP11: RID veloce
  • MP12: Ricevuta bancaria
  • MP13: MAV
  • MP14: quietanza erario stato
  • MP15: giroconto su conti di contabilit speciale
  • MP16: domiciliazione bancaria
  • MP17: domiciliazione postale
  • MP18: Bollettino di c/c postale
  • MP19: SEPA Direct Debit
  • MP20: SEPA Direct Debit CORE
  • MP21: SEPA Direct Debit B2B
  • MP22: Trattenuta su somme gi riscosse
  • MP23: PagoPA

cab.description: If the used payment method requires is (example: wire transfer), it contains the involved cab

iban.description: If the used payment method requires is (example: wire transfer), it contains the involved iban

abi.description: If the used payment method requires is (example: wire transfer), it contains the involved abi

bic.description: If the used payment method requires is (example: wire transfer), it contains the involved bic

ddt_number.description: DDT number associated to the transaction

is_oil.description: True if the transaction refers to OIL article, false otherwise

vat_amount.description: Vat amount applied to the taxable amount

credit_note_detail_id.description: Optional credit note detail id (used when this transaction is reversed)

invoice_id.description: Reference to invoice where this record is included

vat_id.description: Vat rate user for this transaction

decrement_total.description: If true, decrements transaction amount from the total. False otherwise.

discount_increase.description: 0 if there is no discount on the transaction's total amount.

unit_price.description: Unit price of the purchased article

detail_status_code.description: Current status of this record. It can be SF01 (to be approved), SF02 (approved) or SF12 (manually rejected)

card_id.description: Optional card involved in this transaction

insert_invoice_mode_id.description:
Identifies transaction's origin. Possibile values:
  • 1: manual insert by manager
  • 2: manual insert by the customer
  • 3: from station PC
  • 4: from Self, by customer with ticket number
  • : Selfnet transaction

total_amount.description: Total gros amount of this transaction

user_id.description: Id of the user who created this transaction in the invoice

fuel_station_address.description: Address of the involved fuel station (if present)

range_end.description: Final id for massive card creation

range_start.description: Initial id for massive card creation

has_excise_duty.description: True if the invoices binded to this card must report the excise duty amount, false otherwise

customer_id.description: Id of the customer owner of the card

supplier_id.description: Id of the supplier owner of the card

delivery_datetime.description: When the card is given to the customer

username.description: Username that requested unlock or lock on card

cardUnLockInput.title: UnLock card request

is_lock_request.description: If true, the request lock card. If false the request unlock card

cardUnLockInput.description: info data for request of Unlock
